DOC.brief_summary: Healthy male volunteer administer alone combination dapoxetine 30mg mirodenafil 50mg three time , respectively pharmacokinetic interaction compare two drug .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male adult age 19 55 Body mass index ( BMI ) range 19 27 kg/m2 Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study Available entire study period Subject history liver disease , kidney , digestive system , respiratory system , endocrine system , nervous psychiatric , blood , cancer , cardiovascular disease Subject clinically significant vital sign ( sit position blood pressure ) ( 90 mmHg > systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 mmHg , 60 mmHg > diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mmHg ) History drug abuse History caffeine , alcohol , smoke abuse caffeine ( coffee , tea , coke ) > 4cups/day smoking > 10 cigarettes/day alcohol > 140g/week Consumption grapefruit grapefruitcontaining juice 1 cup day Previously donate whole blood within 60 day component blood within 30 day Subject take drug affect ADME investigational product Subject know hypersensitivity reaction mirodenafil/ dapoxetine drug Inadequate laboratory test result : AST ( SGOT ) ALT ( SGPT ) total bilirubin > 1.5 x upper limit normal range eGFR < low limit normal range Subject consider unsuitable base medical judgement investigator
